title: One of my patients tried to commit suicide last night
body:
I had honestly thought he was doing better. The last couple times I had interviewed him he's been a little more bright, but today he was a mess again and last night he tried to choke himself  to death with a drawstring he pulled out of a pair of shorts he had. I'm not sure if it was just something that happened, if it was a reaction to new medication, or if it was because his mother told him she was going to visit him and then never showed up. Either way it's depressing. Inpatient child psychiatry is pretty brutal.

Feels bad man.
